KLYNTAR
Who we are?

KLYNTAR — ukrainian startup that tryna go
over our mind borders and make that rly
crazy world better in order to finally make
innovations instead our self-destruction.

Be aware of our net and keep your data in
security. Make transactions fast and cheap.

Let no man separate what we create...

Security

Security in our system is the biggest and the
coolest feature ever.

Klyntar is saving your data in some containers
inside another ones and then save it’s hash
to another blockchains to keep the best
safety of your transactions ever.

Robbers need to hack Bitcoin, Dash, Monero
and chains of other cryptos connected to KLY
net. It’s impossible...

Documentation — Security
Services

Since now you dont need to use Solidity - the
big “cell” for all crypto developers today...

Just now, with KLYNTAR platfrom, you are
able to write smart contracts with programming
language you have chosen. Even your own one.

Share your code with your friends or make
your code safe & reliable for other people
to launch it.

Build future with us!

Documentation — Services
The Fast And Furious Cheap

Since KLYNTAR uses many ways of many chains to
make sure your transaction is acknowledged — we
don’t need to wait finalization in each chain...

We finalize with our techniques and therefore
our TPS is 777k!

As you know from “Security” block, we use many
transactions in one block (so the cost is peanuts)
and give em much more safety that they can find
in Bitcoin etc.

Trololo 123...

We went out of the box again bruh

GET FREE 100 KLY

For our first users we are ready to share 100 KLYs
that are used to make transactions in our system.

Note: other 80% of KLYs will be shared soon!

To get our tokens you need:

  1. Read our documentation
    (ru.mastering.klyntar.org)
  2. Download KLYNTAR
    (github.com/klyntar/download)
  3. Create your account in system
    (klyntar-docs/register.html)
  4. Send the hash of your wallet in KLYNTAR
    on our email: klyntar@gmail.com
  5. PLEASE,add your first feelings abotu us
    & about our documentation in the letter.
    We appreciate it. Let’s build future together!
